# SMS_Final_Project
**Team name:** SMS
**Members:** Mariah Babski (mgb139@pitt.edu), Shirin Khandare (sak811@pitt.edu), Susan Agbokah (sua117@pitt.edu)

**Description and links to the datasets used**
Condemned & Dead-End properties: https://data.wprdc.org/dataset/condemned-properties
Smart Trash Containers: https://data.wprdc.org/dataset/smart-trash-containers/resource/75b83ac9-8069-4cf1-bcc3-b9e6b04487d9
Monthly Criminal Activity: https://data.wprdc.org/dataset/monthly-criminal-activity-dashboard/resource/bd41992a-987a-4cca-8798-fbe1cd946b07

**Overview:**
We are measuring the amount of general safety when it comes to the different neighborhoods of Pittsburgh, in particular, public and enviornmental safety.
